argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_xpeq12 | |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( x X. y ) = ( A X. B ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_imaeq2d | |- ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( +h " ( x X. y ) ) = ( +h " ( A X. B ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_df-shs | |- +H = ( x e. SH , y e. SH |-> ( +h " ( x X. y ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_hilablo | |- +h e. AbelOp |
| 5 |  | #P_imaexg | |- ( +h e. AbelOp -> ( +h " ( A X. B ) ) e. _V ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( +h " ( A X. B ) ) e. _V |
| 7 | 2, 3, 6 | #P_ovmpt2a | |- ( ( A e. SH /\ B e. SH ) -> ( A +H B ) = ( +h " ( A X. B ) ) ) |
